page.title: 07A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A CHILD
page.content: I live on a farm.We have cows and sheep.I woke early yesterday on a fine Spring morning to find that father was busy with the milking of our herd of Friesan cows.Before I had my breakfast I went out with my mother to feed some of the new lambs especially those born overnight which were orphans.Sometimes I have to rub the newly born lambs very hard to generate warmth or they would die.Breakfast over it is only a very short walk with my younger brother to the village school along the A 40 road.Yesterday I came home about 4 p.m. I took some of my school friends with me.They fed my pony and the lambs with me .After they had gone home I went to help my father with the planting of potatoes in the fields.
